body:
Hey guys, 
I recently blught myself an Optifine Cape, but for some reason I can't see my cape.
Others say they can but when I look at myself I can't. I'm not sure how to fix this. Has anybody else had this problem? Or know how to fix it?


Thanks
body_tagged:
Hey guys, 
I recently blught myself an Optifine Cape, but for some reason I can't see my cape.
Others say they can but when I look at myself I can't. I'm not sure how to fix this. Has anybody else had this problem? Or know how to fix it?


Thanks
title: Help with Optifine Cape

replies.body: Go to www.optifine.net, log in with your donation email under the donations tab, click on activate cape and choose your design, click OK and you're done. I'm pretty sure you also needed to click 'activate cape for username' while purchasing the cape otherwise im pretty sure you just simply donated to optifine and got no cape :/
replies.body_tagged: Go to www.optifine.net, log in with your donation email under the donations tab, click on activate cape and choose your design, click OK and you're done. I'm pretty sure you also needed to click 'activate cape for username' while purchasing the cape otherwise im pretty sure you just simply donated to optifine and got no cape :/

replies.body:
Yeah I tried that and nothing worked :/
people say they can see my cape but I can't see it. Does it have something to do with my computor?
replies.body_tagged:
Yeah I tried that and nothing worked :/
people say they can see my cape but I can't see it. Does it have something to do with my computor?

replies.body:
Try clicking "Game Menu" > "Options" > "Multiplayer Settings" > "Show Cape: ON"

or

 "Game Menu" > "Options" > "Video Settings" > "Details" > "Show Cape: ON"
replies.body_tagged:
Try clicking "Game Menu" > "Options" > "Multiplayer Settings" > "Show Cape: ON"

or

 "Game Menu" > "Options" > "Video Settings" > "Details" > "Show Cape: ON"

replies.body: Thanks but I still can't see it, others still can.. Idk why
replies.body_tagged: Thanks but I still can't see it, others still can.. Idk why

replies.body:
Do you have optifine installed?
Make sure you have it installed, this happened to me before because I didn't have optifine and it took me a while to realize
